name: voting_app
description: "website" folder contains all files for the website - "index.html" is the login page - "signup.html" is the create account page - "home.html" is the page that lists elections - "voting.html" displays the current election and enables voting - "submitted.html" displays after vote submission - "results.html" lists all previous elections - "result.html" displays the result of one election - each html has a corresponding css file inside the "css" folder - - "styles.css" is the base css file - "imgs" folder holds candidates images - "js" folder holds java script files for all pages - - "home.js" welcomes the user and list elections in both elections lists - - "result.js" displays the result of one election - - "results.js" adds to the list all previous results - - "elections.js" prints election title and description - - "voting.js" controls the content of voting page
